Class CounterModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • CounterModel
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChainedCounterModel, FastCounter

    public class CounterModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which is a model for a counter

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CounterModel()
      Constructor which initializes a new counter with standard modulus value and increases number of counters by 1
      CounterModel(int modulus)
      Constructor which initializes a new counter with modulus according to argument Increases number of counters by 1

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void decrement()
      Method which decreases counter value by 1 with consideration to modulus If less than 0, value becomes max(modulus) value-1
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
      Compares classes and current value between Object and counter

      static int getNbrOfCounters() 
      int getValue()

      Method which increases counter value by 1 with consideration to modulus

      Method which resets value to 0

        clone, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CounterModel

        public CounterModel()
        Constructor which initializes a new counter with standard modulus value and increases number of counters by 1

      • CounterModel

        public CounterModel(int modulus)
        Constructor which initializes a new counter with modulus according to argument Increases number of counters by 1
        Parameters:
        modulus - is the modulus ("max value") for the counter
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if modulus is lesser than 0

    • Method Detail

      • increment

        public void increment()
        Method which increases counter value by 1 with consideration to modulus

      • decrement

        public void decrement()
        Method which decreases counter value by 1 with consideration to modulus If less than 0, value becomes max(modulus) value-1

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Method which resets value to 0

        Returns:
        current value of counter

        Returns:
        number of counters created

        public int getMod()
        Returns:
        current modulus value

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        string containing information of counter's modulus and current value

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
        Compares classes and current value between Object and counter
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        o - is the Object used for comparing
        Returns:
        true/false value based on identity between Object and counter
